PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-11422012-09-27,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActFirst Nations Goods and Services Tax Act
SubjectOrder Amending Schedule 2 to the First Nations Goods and Services Tax Act, No. 2012-2 (Six Manitoba Bands)
PrecisOrder Amending SCHEDULE 2 TO THE FIRST NATIONS GOODS AND SERVICES TAX ACT, No. 2012-2 (SIX MANITOBA BANDS) in order to add the name of the province of Manitoba, the name of the six Indian bands situated in Manitoba, the name of each band's council and the description of each band's reserves where the provincial-type tax law could apply.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0199 Publication Date: 2012-10-10
AttachmentsAttachment
